Class ingen.html.util.CookieUtil 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ingen.html.util.CookieUtil
public class CookieUtil
extends Object
Classes contain functions for setting,removing client side cookie and getting value of client side cookie.

CookieUtil()

getCookie(HttpServletRequest, String)
SUMMARY:
Get Client side cookie value.
removeCookie(HttpServletResponse, String)
SUMMARY:
Remove Client side cookie.
setCookie(HttpServletResponse, String, String, int)
SUMMARY:
Set Client side cookie.
setCookie(HttpServletResponse, String, String, int, boolean)
SUMMARY:
Set Client side cookie.

CookieUtil 
 public CookieUtil()

setCookie 
 public Cookie setCookie(HttpServletResponse response,
                         String name,
                         String value,
                         int exp,
                         boolean secure)
SUMMARY:
Set Client side cookie.

PARAMETERS
1) HttpServletResponse response : Referance to HttpServletResponse Object.
2) String name    : Name of cookie to be set.
3) String value   : Value of cookie to be set.
4) int exp        : Expiry time of cookie in seconds 
-ve value sets cookie life equal to browser session.
0 value removes the cookie but using removeCookie function 
is better option for removing cookie.  
5) boolean secure  : secure flag.

setCookie 
 public Cookie setCookie(HttpServletResponse response,
                         String name,
                         String value,
                         int exp)
SUMMARY:
Set Client side cookie.

PARAMETERS
1) HttpServletResponse response : Referance to HttpServletResponse Object.
2) String name    : Name of cookie to be set.
3) String value   : Value of cookie to be set.
4) int exp        : Expiry time of cookie in seconds 
-ve value sets cookie life equal to browser session.
0 value removes the cookie but using removeCookie function 
is better option for removing cookie.

removeCookie 
 public void removeCookie(HttpServletResponse response,
                          String name)
SUMMARY:
Remove Client side cookie.

PARAMETERS
1) HttpServletResponse response : Referance to HttpServletResponse Object.
2) String name                  : Name of cookie to be removed.

getCookie 
 public String getCookie(HttpServletRequest request,
                         String name)
SUMMARY:
Get Client side cookie value.

PARAMETERS
1) HttpServletRequest response : Referance to HttpServletRequest Object.
2) String name                 : Name of cookie.
